overview: John Angelo is an award-winning user interface director, designer, and engineer and founder of Cultara, Aulle, and SwapNerd. He specializes in world-class mobile, desktop software, television and web user interface conceptual design with dedicated focus on heuristics, aesthetics and ethnographic design. He is an avid researcher and innovator of human-computer interaction, cognitive dimensions of notation, and haptic design.
